commit.message:
DB-9682 SELECT on external table needs to check number of columns returned

Fixing bug "SELECT on external table with text format fails with
ArrayOutOfBoundsException if not enough Columns in file". Will now
throw more understandable exception.

Other options here would be to default the missing columns to NULL
or a custom value (-> feature request).
